qas.question: When did the UN Security Council recommend that the Marshall Islands be allowed to join the UN?
When did the UN General Assembly approve the Marshall Islands joining the UN?
What nation does the Marshall Islands vote similarly to in the General Assembly?
What Security Council Resolution recommended that the Marshall Islands be allowed to join the UN?

context: The Marshall Islands was admitted to the United Nations based on the Security Council's recommendation on <a0_0>August 9, 1991<a0_0/>, in <a3_0>Resolution 704<a3_0/> and the General Assembly's approval on <a1_0>September 17, 1991<a1_0/>, in Resolution 46/3. In international politics within the United Nations, the Marshall Islands has often voted consistently with <a2_0>the United States<a2_0/> with respect to General Assembly resolutions.
